no_permission: &cYou do not have permission to do this!
reflection_error: &cAn error occurred while executing the command!
not_player: &cYou cannot execute this command outside of the game!
locale_not_found: &cLocalization '&c&l{LOCALE}&c' not found! You can select only &f&l{LOCALES}
info_command:
&b&l===== &6LOCALIZATION &b&l=====
<CMD=/locale change::&6Use command>&2/locale change</CMD>&2 - set localization by GUI
<CMD=/locale set::&6Use command>&a/locale set %locale%</CMD>&a - set localization
<CMD=/locale help::&6Use command>&2/locale help</CMD>&2 - information on commands
<CMD=/locale list::&6Use command>&a/locale list</CMD>&a - list of available locales
first_join:
&b&l===== &6LOCALIZATION &b&l=====
&2Your language is set to &f&l{LOCALE}&2.

<CMD=/locale change::&6Change locale>&aClick to change this</CMD>
resource_declined: &cYou were kicked because did not accept server resources.
plugin_error: &cAn error occurred while executing the command! Check your console.
generated_code:
&d&l----&b&lDARKWATERAPI&d&l----

<COPY={CODE}::&b&lYour code:
